entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 8.4°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
